channel.title: Making Rogue 3x thieve money
channel.description: Hey guys.. I was just wondering if anyone could help me code something into my server.. I was looking for a code that would make you 3x the amount thieved from the stall when wearing the full set of Rogue. So, if you just wear bits of Rogue or none at all, it would just be normal cash, but when wearing the full set it 3x the amount. Is this possible? If so, could someone please tell me how to script it in? Thanks

item.title: Making Rogue 3x thieve money
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

I’m kinda new to coding, so could you please tell me where to add this?
And into what file? I’m guessing Client.java, but don’t know if I’m right.
Thanks very much.

EDIT: If someone has teamviewer, could maybe you help me? At the moment, my stalls give out items to sell an NPC for money. I either want to change that so it just gives out cash, or maybe so it 3x the amount of items you get. Please if someone helps, I will +rep as much as I can… PLEASE.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Rogue 3x thieve money
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:2, topic:456978”] public boolean fullRogue(){ return(playerEquipment[playerChest] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerHat] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerHands] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerFeet] == xxxx); }[/quote]
fixed that for you

Read full topic

item.title: Making Rogue 3x thieve money
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

public boolean fullRogue(){ if(playerEquipment[playerChest] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerHat] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerHands] == xxxx && playerEquipment[playerFeet] == xxxx) return true; else{ return false; } }

if(!fullRogue()){ addItem(995, 10); } if(fullRogue()){ addItem(995, 30); }

Read full topic

item.title: Making Rogue 3x thieve money
item.dc:creator: @KFC KFC
item.description:
@KFC wrote:

Hey guys…
I was just wondering if anyone could help me code something into my server…
I was looking for a code that would make you 3x the amount thieved from the stall when wearing the full set of Rogue.
So, if you just wear bits of Rogue or none at all, it would just be normal cash, but when wearing the full set it 3x the amount.
Is this possible? If so, could someone please tell me how to script it in?
Thanks
